headline: Surge In Stock Buybacks On Stretched Valuations A Sign Of Hubris
summary: Discover why the S&P 500's optimism might be misplaced as U.S. macroeconomic fundamentals and SPX valuations flash warning signs.

headline: D.R. Horton's Undervaluation May Trigger Rich Upside Once Macro Headwinds Ease
summary: D.R. Horton remains undervalued, no matter the lowered FY2025 guidance and uncertain macro headwinds. Check out why I maintain a buy rating on DHI stock.
